body_html:
@sunahsuh wants to know the end date for an experiment, and @gregglind suggested that the date when a recipe was last disabled is a good proxy for that.

This wouldn't strictly work for experiments that are time-limited by the filter expression itself, but since we don't want enabled recipes to sit around forever, we'd eventually disable those recipes. I think it's a good "I'm done with this experiment" signal.

@sunahsuh, is there a date you need this shipped by?
title: Expose date that a recipe was disabled in the API
